parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1 </name>=<value> Multiplayer

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Return the player's remaining time before respawn, or -1 if it is not available (such as when the player is alive).

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''playerRespawnTime'''

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[waitUntil]] {[[playerRespawnTime]] <= 0};</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[setPlayerRespawnTime]]
</value></part></template>

<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment>
<dd class="notedate">Posted on June 21, 2007 - 18:33 (CEST)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Sy|Sy]]</dt>
<dd class="note">When playerRespawnTime reaches zero the player respawns as expected. When the player has completed respawning this command returns -1.
</dd>
<dd class="notedate">Posted on  February 25, 2009  - 18:33 (CEST)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:RolanDecoy|RolanDecoy]]</dt>
<dd class="note">Also note that spawning doesn't create a body to use, but allows a player to choose an already
existing one as defined either in the mission editor or in a script as [[player]] or playable.
</dd>
<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>


<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma1</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma2</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>tkoh</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template></root>
